name: Neville Staple
description: '''Neville Eugenton Staple''' (born 11 April 1955), sometimes credited as '''Neville Staples''', is a Jamaican-born British singer, known for his work with the [[Two-tone (music genre)|2-tone]] [[ska]] band [[the Specials]], the pop group [[Fun Boy Three]], as well as with his own group, the Neville Staple Band. He also performed with [[Ranking Roger]] in the [[supergroup (music)|supergroup]] Special Beat.
